thread.title: Watch Charli XCX Perform “After the Afterparty” on “Kimmel”
thread.title_full: Watch Charli XCX Perform “After the Afterparty” on “Kimmel”

author: Pitchfork
title: Watch Charli XCX Perform “After the Afterparty” on “Kimmel”
text:
3 hrs ago Watch Charli XCX Perform “After the Afterparty” on “Kimmel” She also played “Bounce” with PC Music’s A.G. Cook passed out behind her on a fuzzy white stage Charli XCX 
Charli XCX was the musical guest on a recent episode of “ Jimmy Kimmel Live !” She performed her Lil Yachty-featuring single “ After the Afterparty ” and the previously teased track “Bounce.” She played both songs on a fuzzy white stage built inside the studio with A.G. Cook of PC Music passed out behind her. Watch both performances below. Charli and Cook debuted “Bounce,” which still doesn’t have an official version, during PC Music’s Pop City Party at L.A.’s Create in July . There, Carly Rae Jepson also performed her unreleased “Supernatural” single with Danny L. Harle. 
Watch Charli XCX’s episode of “Over/Under” on Pitchfork.tv: Artists In This Story
